channel.title: Help a n00b :]
channel.description:
Rightt... Anyone know how to change the ranged exp you get from targets?
Thanks
-Jam

item.title: Help a n00b :]
item.dc:creator: @Itachi_Uchiha Itachi Uchiha
item.description:
@Itachi_Uchiha wrote:

look in client.java and search for

case 2514:

it should look like this

if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You shoot at the target."); actionName = "range1"; actionTimer = 30; setAnimation(426); addSkillXP((15*playerLevel[4]), 4); addSkillXP((5*playerLevel[18]), 18); addItem(3272, 1); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;
replace the addSkillXP((15*playerLevel[4]), 4) to the number that you want the xp to be :)[br][size=1]Posted at: September 20, 2006, 01:13:40 PM[/size][hr]lol i just found this in my client and idk if it works or not try it lol

Read full topic
